INDEMNITY INSURANCE CO v PHILIPPI INDEMNITY INSURANCE CO v EHLEN INDEMNITY INSURANCE CO v SCUDDER Ohio Appeals, 2nd Dist, Franklin Co Decided Jan 30, 1934 Phil S. Bradford, Columbus, and Charles S. Druggan, Columbus, for plaintiff in error. Morton, Blanchard <Ss Tou Velle, Columbus, and Ernest Cornell for defendants in error. For full opinion see 1 OO 212; 192 NE 884; 48 Oh Ap 248.
